data.name: frmadmin_xb
data.value: Please enter the verification code again

data.name: frmamac_label1_Text
data.value: The purpose of programming this program is to use the library effectively and to be aware of what's room's sources. When we come to the room to search for a book, because the library is chaotic, most of the time, we didn't success to find any book which is useful for all of us. In the face of such a situation, we, as Hupt, wanted to make more functional the room's library and as a consequence, the program showed up.

data.name: frmarama_label1
data.value: 3-) Not only you can search with name, surname or book's name but also you can search with bookshelf's name, date of issue, language.)(All of yours search process is done synchronously. In other words, you can search the book with only one feature or five features. It depends on your search preferences.

data.name: frmarama_label3
data.value: 1-) You don't have to write complete name when search a book or author, also, it doesn't matter you use upper - lower case.

data.name: frmarama_label4
data.value: Let's say that name of the book is "Hacettepe", you can search this book a lot of different ways present at below:

data.name: frmarama_label5
data.value: -hacettepe, HaCeTTEpE, cettepe, tepe, acet, Hace, üniversite, üni, versite, versi, site, cettepe, cet....

data.name: frmarama_label6
data.value: Like all of the above, the most important point you have to pay attention, you must write the text according to the order of the book name or author name. If you search a book or author these ways, you can find it easily what you search. For example, if you search "Hacettepe" book with "ceta" text instead of "acet" text, unfortunately, you can not find anything.

data.name: frmarama_label7
data.value: 2-)Name of the author was written with the same name found on the book's cover. (Exp: Mehmet Akif Sayılgan or A.Gül Aydın or Gül N. Eryüksel)Also, we haven't entered any author's name with the author's job titles like "Dr.". So, if you want to search any author, we recommend that it had better you search author's first and second name separately or search the only surname because some of the author's name has abbreviation on first name or some has abbreviation on the second name; but, author's surname has never written with an abbreviation.

data.name: frmdgr_basari
data.value: Your admin authorization is activated successfully.

data.name: frmduzen_label13_Text
data.value: All of the books, one by one, was placed to the shelves appropriate for their content, and then, to all of these books, was given a number. All of the information which is related to books like which floor and shelf the book was placed and the number with which book was registered was entered to the program.

data.name: frmduzen_label14_Text
data.value: In the right side, a sample bookshelf layout was demonstrated.

data.name: frmduzen_label15_Text
data.value: Also, at "Bookshelf Name" part which is found in the program, name of bookshelves which we placed books and which abbreviations we express on the books was shown.

data.name: frmduzen_label16_Text
data.value: (D) was used for Experimental Psychology's abbreviation at the bookshelf. For example, Sixty numbered a book which was present at third floor has a layout like "D-60" on it(In the right side, these numbers which are present at near of shelves is representative).

data.name: frmhataliid_label
data.value: Let's say that you contacted with 133.ID but you selected wrongly 134.ID and clicked the button, then, you realized that your selection is wrong. If so, you can use this button to fix the ID selection. At fix the wrong ID selection menu, you must select the wrong ID and click this button.

data.name: frmkisi_boskutucuk_mb_part1_button6
data.value: Please select a ID from the box.

data.name: frmkisi_btnekle_tooltiptext
data.value: How to add new person? *You can add the register of new person's data by entering the correct data to the four boxes present above.

data.name: frmkisi_btnekle_tooltiptext1
data.value: How to add new person? *You can add the register of new person's data by entering the correct data to the seven boxes present above.

data.name: frmkisi_btnguncelle_tooltiptext
data.value: How to update a person's data? *You can update person by dragging the cursor on the row found the person's data, after you drag the cursor, click this row, and then, you can see the person's data will be written into the boxes, after that, you can enter new data to the boxes and then click the "Update" button, the person's data will be updated.

data.name: frmkisi_btnsil_tooltiptext
data.value: How to delete a person's data? *You can delete person by dragging the cursor on the row found the person's data, after you drag the cursor, click this row, and then, you can see the person's data will be written into the boxes, after that, if you click the "Delete" button, the person's data will be deleted.

data.name: frmkisi_btnuzat_tooltiptext
data.value: How to extend the duration of reserving book? *You can extend the duration of reserving book by dragging the cursor on the row found the person's data, after you drag the cursor, click this row, and then, you can see the person's data will be written into the boxes, after that, if you click the "Extend duration" button, the duration of reserving book will be extended.

data.name: frmkisi_button5_tooltiptext
data.value: This button's task is easy. People who take the book and yet don't bring back the book are listed here. After two months, we contact people via their phone numbers and we demand the book to bring back, and we select the ID which people have and then click this button, so, the date we contact the people is registered to the program.

data.name: msg
data.value: If you want to edit a person's or a book's info which is found on the program, you have to get the admin authorization. We don't want to leave the program's edit part open for all friends. Instead, we regulate the program for partial control of access, so, we set up a rule of getting admin authorization for those who wants to edit info.(all friends who activate own email can be an admin). Thanks to this, we can get a copy of all kinds of info edit which have done on the system.(On the main menu's linklabel which named "Admin's usage records", you can see all of system copy) and at a possible wrong edit, we can fix the wrong edit by looking at the copy.

data.name: msg4
data.value: Unfortunately, I couldn't give support to search journal articles because(It takes too long) there are lots of web site which is created to search journal articles. After you search content which is useful for you on these websites, you can find these content by looking at the program according to volume numbers' or serial numbers' of journals which you searched, so, you can see whether the content is here.
